name: kanidm
tagline: A modern identity and authentication platform with LDAP compatibility
description: Kanidm is an identity management system and LDAP compatible directory service. It aims to provide secure, modern authentication and authorization features for self hosted infrastructure with both CLI and web administration tools.

features.title: Identity Management
features.description: Manage users, groups, and credentials in a centralized directory

features.title: Authentication Services
features.description: Provide authentication for applications and services

features.title: Authorization Policies
features.description: Define access rules based on users and groups

features.title: API Access
features.description: Integrate identity services with external applications

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the identity service on your own infrastructure
